title: Ground News - Russian army attacked Novotiahyntsi in Kherson region, man was wounded
text:
Summary by censor.net Russian army shelled Novotiahyntsi in the Kherson region, a 38-year-old man was injured. Share menu More
Filters 3 Articles 3 Articles All Left Center Right
ZN.UA Зеркало недели Russian massed attacks on the village in Kherson region: there is a wounded The Russian occupation troops on Thursday, December 28, struck more than 10 times on the village of Zolotaya Balka, the New Aleksandrovsky people of the Kherson region, reports the Kherson regional military administration in Telegram. As a result of the shooting of the army of the Russian Federation, the postal detachment was interrupted. The windows blew out in the premises. A 60-year-old man was wounded. The occupiers regularly strike on the r…
